articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Men's Under-19 World Cup to run from January 19 to February 11 in South Africa - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The format has changed, with teams advancing from the groups going into a Super Six stage before the knockouts
articles.content: NewsThe format has changed, with teams advancing from the groups going into a Super Six stage before the knockouts
